title: France panorama. [No. 72/46]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: River race - 200 canoes and kayaks on the Cure River; Pegasus mock-up - wind-tunnel tests for the geophysical and astronomical study-platform Pegasus. 2. The protection of nature and man: Protection of the environment - horse-patrols in the forests; Driver protection - road-accident prevention. 3. Young painters - exhibition in the Paris Senate. 4. Chartres conceret - ancient music in the Chartres cathedral.
